scripts.cy:open: npx cypress open --env allure=true --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/** --browser chrome
scripts.cy:run: DEBUG=allure-plugin* npx cypress run --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/* --env allure=true --browser chrome
scripts.cy:run:firefox: DEBUG=allure-plugin* npx cypress run --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/* --env allure=true --browser firefox
scripts.cy:run:edge: DEBUG=allure-plugin* npx cypress run --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/* --env allure=true --browser edge
scripts.cy:run:electron: DEBUG=allure-plugin* npx cypress run --config specPattern=cypress/e2e/* --env allure=true --browser electron
scripts.allure:history: mv -f allure-report/history allure-results/history && rm -r allure-report || true
